statuses.name: Wet
statuses.description: Slick with water. Vulnerable to Lightning and Cold (2x damage), Resistant to Fire (0.5x damage). Prevents Burning.

statuses.name: Shocked
statuses.description: Rattled by electricity.

statuses.name: Prone
statuses.description: Knocked to the ground.

statuses.name: Dazed
statuses.description: Disoriented and unable to react.

statuses.name: Blinded
statuses.description: Cannot see properly.

statuses.name: Threatened
statuses.description: A nearby enemy is pressuring this combatant.

statuses.name: Paralyzed
statuses.description: Incapacitated and unable to act.

statuses.name: Stunned
statuses.description: Reeling and unable to act.

statuses.name: Sleep
statuses.description: Incapacitated while asleep.

statuses.name: Hypnotised
statuses.description: Entranced and unable to act.

statuses.name: Lightning Charges
statuses.description: Charged with crackling power.

statuses.name: Radiating Orb
statuses.description: Shimmering motes make attacks less accurate.

statuses.name: Reverberation
statuses.description: Destabilizing vibration reduces physical saves.

statuses.name: Bleeding
statuses.description: Losing blood over time.

statuses.name: Blessed
statuses.description: Bolstered by divine favor.

statuses.name: Haste
statuses.description: Enhanced speed and reflexes.

statuses.name: Lethargic
statuses.description: Cannot act while recovering from haste.

statuses.name: Globe of Invulnerability
statuses.description: Strongly mitigates incoming damage while active.

statuses.name: Dash
statuses.description: Movement capacity is temporarily boosted.

statuses.name: Hidden
statuses.description: Harder to target and gains attack advantage. Removed after attacking or casting offensive spells.

statuses.name: Dipped Weapon
statuses.description: Weapon carries elemental residue. Removed after 2 weapon hits.

statuses.name: Dipped: Fire
statuses.description: Weapon coated in fire. Deals 1d4 extra fire damage on weapon hits. Removed after 2 hits.

statuses.name: Dipped: Poison
statuses.description: Weapon coated in poison. Deals 1d4 extra poison damage on weapon hits. Removed after 2 hits.

statuses.name: Dipped: Acid
statuses.description: Weapon coated in acid. Deals 1d4 extra acid damage on weapon hits. Removed after 2 hits.

statuses.name: Shield
statuses.description: Arcane barrier that sharply increases AC.

statuses.name: Spirit Guardians
statuses.description: Protective spirits swirl around the caster.

statuses.name: Cloud of Daggers
statuses.description: Slicing magical blades persist in an area.

statuses.name: Spike Growth
statuses.description: Ground is covered in barbed growths.

statuses.name: Action Surge
statuses.description: Surging with energy, granting an additional action this turn.

statuses.name: Disengaged
statuses.description: Movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

statuses.name: Rage
statuses.description: Filled with primal fury, dealing extra damage and resisting physical harm (bludgeoning, piercing, slashing).

statuses.name: Reckless Attack
statuses.description: Attacking recklessly with advantage, but enemies have advantage against you.

statuses.name: Frenzy
statuses.description: Attacking in a frenzy, able to make bonus action attacks while raging.

statuses.name: Bear Heart Rage
statuses.description: Raging with the heart of a bear, resisting all damage except psychic.

statuses.name: Frightened
statuses.description: Cannot approach the fear source. Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

statuses.name: Guided Strike
statuses.description: Divine guidance grants a +10 bonus to your next attack roll.

statuses.name: Destructive Wrath
statuses.description: Your next thunder or lightning damage is maximized.

statuses.name: Aura of Protection
statuses.description: Allies within 3m gain a bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.

statuses.name: Aura of Protection Bonus
statuses.description: A nearby paladin's divine presence bolsters your saving throws.

statuses.name: Symbiotic Entity
statuses.description: Gain temporary hit points and deal extra necrotic damage on weapon hits.

statuses.name: Inspired (d6)
statuses.description: Bolstered by bardic inspiration. Can roll 1d6 and add to one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

statuses.name: Inspired (d8)
statuses.description: Bolstered by bardic inspiration. Can roll 1d8 and add to one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

statuses.name: Inspired (d10)
statuses.description: Bolstered by bardic inspiration. Can roll 1d10 and add to one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

statuses.name: Inspired (Legacy)
statuses.description: Legacy flat bonus version. Use inspired_d6/d8/d10 instead.

statuses.name: Cutting Words (d6)
statuses.description: Demoralized by cutting words. Suffers -1d6 penalty to next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

statuses.name: Cutting Words (d8)
statuses.description: Demoralized by cutting words. Suffers -1d8 penalty to next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

statuses.name: Cutting Words (d10)
statuses.description: Demoralized by cutting words. Suffers -1d10 penalty to next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

statuses.name: Cutting Words (Legacy)
statuses.description: Legacy flat penalty version. Use cutting_words_d6/d8/d10 instead.

statuses.name: Blade Flourish
statuses.description: Executing a defensive blade technique, boosting AC and damage.

statuses.name: Dodging
statuses.description: Attacks against you have disadvantage. You make DEX saving throws with advantage.

statuses.name: Hexed
statuses.description: Cursed by warlock magic. Takes 1d6 necrotic damage per hit (handled by on-hit trigger).

statuses.name: GWM Power Attack
statuses.description: Taking -5 to attack rolls to gain +10 to damage.

statuses.name: Sharpshooter Power Shot
statuses.description: Taking -5 to ranged attack rolls to gain +10 to damage.

statuses.name: Sentinel Stop
statuses.description: Speed reduced to 0 by Sentinel feat.

statuses.name: Lucky
statuses.description: Gain advantage on your next roll due to Lucky feat.

statuses.name: Lucky (Enemy)
statuses.description: Forced to reroll attack due to enemy's Lucky feat.

statuses.name: Glowing
statuses.description: Marked by radiant energy, easier to hit.

statuses.name: Spiritual Weapon
statuses.description: A spectral weapon fights alongside you.

statuses.name: Slowed (Frost)
statuses.description: Frigid energy reduces your movement.

statuses.name: Hunter's Mark
statuses.description: Marked by a hunter. Takes 1d6 extra damage per hit (handled by on-hit trigger).

statuses.name: Burning
statuses.description: On fire, taking damage each turn. Can be removed by water or Help action.

statuses.name: Ensnared
statuses.description: Caught and unable to move. Can be removed by Help action or breaking free.

statuses.name: Divine Smite (Active)
statuses.description: Your melee weapon attacks deal bonus radiant damage by expending spell slots.

statuses.name: Bane
statuses.description: Cursed by dark magic. -1d4 (avg -2) to attack rolls and saving throws.

statuses.name: Shield of Faith
statuses.description: Protected by divine energy. +2 AC.

statuses.name: Favoured Enemy: Humanoids
statuses.description: You have studied humanoids extensively. Deal +2 damage to humanoid creatures.

statuses.name: Favoured Enemy: Beasts
statuses.description: You have studied beasts extensively. Deal +2 damage to beast creatures.

statuses.name: Favoured Enemy: Undead
statuses.description: You have studied undead extensively. Deal +2 damage to undead creatures.

statuses.name: Favoured Enemy: Aberrations
statuses.description: You have studied aberrations extensively. Deal +2 damage to aberration creatures.

statuses.name: Natural Explorer
statuses.description: Your wilderness experience grants you advantage on initiative rolls and you cannot be surprised.

statuses.name: Ensnaring Strike (Primed)
statuses.description: Your next weapon attack will ensnare the target in magical vines.

statuses.name: Ensnared
statuses.description: Caught in magical vines. Restrained and unable to move. Takes 1d6 piercing damage at the start of each turn.

statuses.name: Hail of Thorns (Primed)
statuses.description: Your next weapon attack will explode with thorns, damaging all nearby creatures.

statuses.name: Hide in Plain Sight
statuses.description: Camouflaged against a solid surface. +10 to Stealth checks.

statuses.name: Primeval Awareness
statuses.description: Your senses are attuned to detect supernatural creatures nearby.

statuses.name: Colossus Slayer
statuses.description: Once per turn, you deal extra 1d8 damage to creatures that have already taken damage.

statuses.name: Wild Shape
statuses.description: Transformed into a beast form. Using beast stats and abilities. Cannot cast spells.

statuses.name: Mage Armor
statuses.description: Base AC is 13 + DEX modifier while not wearing armor.

statuses.name: Mirror Image
statuses.description: 3 illusory duplicates absorb attacks. Each duplicate has AC 10 + your DEX modifier.

statuses.name: Armor of Agathys
statuses.description: Protected by spectral frost. Melee attackers take cold damage.

statuses.name: Faerie Fire
statuses.description: Outlined by magical light. Attacks against you have advantage.

statuses.name: Commanded
statuses.description: Must follow a one-word command on your next turn.

statuses.name: Sanctuary
statuses.description: Enemies must succeed on a WIS save to attack you directly.

statuses.name: Restrained
statuses.description: Speed becomes 0. Attack rolls have Disadvantage. Attacks against have Advantage. Disadvantage on Dexterity Saving Throws.

statuses.name: Jumped
statuses.description: Currently airborne from a jump. Cannot be targeted by opportunity attacks.
